A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The visuals are the only thing slightly redeemable in this film. A carbon copy of the originals in a corporate cash grab. Possibly the worst film in this trilogy of money grubbing sequels. The lazy writing\, fan-bait\, and political undertones (it's not subdued in the slightest) all combine to make a movie that can ruin an entire series. Well done Disney\, you've manage to ruin millions of childhoods with 300 million dollars and corporate pandering.
